ygData.subject: Re: Interesting bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, In refference to to you zoning and popping back  with more life than you zoned with. I play on Tarrew Marr server. MANY times this has happened
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,

In refference to to you zoning and popping back with more life than you
zoned with.

I play on Tarrew Marr server. MANY times this has happened lately and what
is actually is is a TIME warp. It happens when you DIE RIGHT AS YOU ZONE.
It for some reason takes you back a few minutes.

Several Dwarven characters were banned for DUPING items and money that way.
They would hand over all their cash and item then duel a friend to almost
death and then kill them as they zoned and they would pop back in time a few
minutes and have all their stuff back. The person they handed their stuff to
ALSO had their stuf THUS having 2 over everything they handed.

I am a hater of bug exploiters and glad they got caught and banned.

Just my guess thats its the same thing that happened to you..


Tuldar 20th level woodelf bard
Nuldar 39th level necromancer
Tarrew Marr server
"Wardancer, Gates of Solaris"
-----Original Message-----
From: Bard <dabard@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 1:44 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Interesting bug


>From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
>Earlier tongiht I was hunting with a druid friend in Permafrost. We got in
>to a bit of trouble so we took off to the zone. When I hit the zone, I
went
>through the whole
>LOADING
>process, but wound up BACK in Permafrost (at the first corner where the 3
>gobbies spawn) and at almost full health (I went in with less than a
bubble,
>and came back with only 1 bubble gone). I'm not complaining or anything,
>but has anyone else noticed this or is it just on The Rathe?
>
>-=B=-
>
